resources.string: You don\'t have any Ad Blocker activated
You won\'t see any dialog because you aren\'t using an Ad Blocker. Congratulations!
You have an Ad Blocker activated
You have saw a dialog about Ad Blockers because you are using an Ad Blocker. It\'s working!
Want to show the Basic dialog?
Tap to display the basic dialog implementation and see how it works.
Display with a custom title and content
You can also create a dialog with custom title and content. Tap to show.
You should disable ads, it\'s really helpful for the developer!
